fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player to fight in a Bout.
- At night, they are roleblocked and you and the target choose the order of these three actions:
- Lunge
- Retreat
- Long Attack
- Lunge beats Long Attack, Long Attack beats Retreat, and Retreat beats Lunge.
- If you both choose the same technique, you will advance to the next technique in your chosen orders.
- (Example: You choose 1. Lunge, 2. Long Attack, and 3. Retreat. Your opponent chooses 1. Lunge, 2. Retreat, and 3. Long Attack. Your first attacks are both lunges which is a tie, so you go to your second attack. Your second attack is a long attack while your opponent retreats, so you win the bout.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB Immune
- The winner of the bout deals a basic attack to the other
- If you win 2 bouts, in day-chat you are announced to be a fencing grandmaster.
